metadata.dc:author: García-Pola Vallejo, M J
Bagán Sebastián, J V
metadata.dc:description: We have realized an epidemiologic study of 467 inflammatory periapical cysts. We have valued: age, sex, radiographic size, localization, clinic, evolution time and morphologic aspects. Ware not agree with some authors about some morphologic description.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio epidemiológico de los quistes inflamatorios periapicales.
[Epidemiological study of inflammatory periapical cysts].
